{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=BRT-AC828 |revision=/M2 (1.50) |asin=B071VCVQ54;GB;,B076ZXSDZB;GB;, |series=AC2600 |serialnum_prefix=90IG01T0-BM3000 |est_release_date=05/31/2016 |fcc_date=12/01/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MSQ-RT0V00 |ic_id=3568A-RT0V00 |us_id= |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=2.37 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8065 |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F1G08ABBEAH4:E |fla2=8 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L6445EM2I-10G |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16FP-DI |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, M.2 SSD slot |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_m.2_num=1 |jtag=yes |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |eth_chip2_model=QCA8033 |eth_chip3_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |eth_chip3_model=QCA8033 |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8370MB |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=8 |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips= |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, SLA, Link Aggregation, |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux;3.4.103; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=AC828M2, AC828M2_5G |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AC2600 Dual WAN VPN Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.asus.com/Commercial-Networking/BRT-AC828/}} {{•}} [https://www.asus.com/Commercial-Networking/BRT-AC828/specifications/ Specifications] {{•}} [https://www.asus.com/Commercial-Networking/BRT-AC828/HelpDesk/ Support page] Manuf P/N: '''90IG01T0-BU2000 / 90IG01T0-BM3000''' *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RT0V00 MSQ-RT0V00] (2016-08-11) PCB REV 1.50 :Because M.2 SSD (42/60/80) is assigned to port 3 :and ASUS BRT-AC828/M2 doesn't have SD card slot. &{{FCC ST|11/09/2016|indexme.}}--> {{see also|Synology RT2600ac|Netgear R7800}} ===Overview=== *'''Stable Wi-Fi Range''' - Fast, stable Wi-Fi throughout your office with :4x4 MIMO antenna design and ASUS AiRadar beamforming *'''Hardware Dual-WAN''' - Dual physical WAN ports for ultimate speed and :reliability, with up to 2Gbps aggregated bandwidth and failover capability *'''M.2 Slot for Faster Storage''' - Internal M.2 SATA slot for networked SSD storage *'''Easy Management''' - Grow business with Captive Portal to set up customer Wi-Fi :and manage your network with convenient Device Grouping and RADIUS server *'''Improved Network Safety''' - Protect sensitive company information with AiProtection, :VLAN, hardware crypto engine IPsec VPN, all without sacrificing working efficiency. *'''Up to 250 Simultaneous Client Connections''' - MU-MIMO design and robust :connectivity for the most demanding environments *'''Teaming Support''' - Up to 4Gbps LAN connections (Link Aggregation 802.3ad) ===Specifications=== *Processor: @1.7GHz dual-core ([[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065) *Memory: 128MB (SPI/NAND) flash and 512MB (DDR3) RAM *Wi-Fi technology: Quad-Stream, Wave2 (160MHz), MU-MIMO *Wi-Fi speeds: up to 2.53Gbps (1733+800 Mbps) *Four (4x) external antennas, Twin (2x) USB 3.0 ports *Power Supply: AC Input: 110~240V (50/60Hz) :DC Output: 19V with max. 2.37A (3.42A) current *Dimensions: 190mm x 300mm x 49.5mm (WxDxH) (Without Bezel) *Weight: 950g ===News=== *[http://press.asus.com/PressReleases/p/ASUS-Announces-Latest-Line-up-of-Lifestyle-and-Gaming-Innovations-at-Computex-2016 ''ASUS Announces Latest Line-up of Lifestyle and Gaming
Innovations at Computex 2016'' - Press release on '''ASUS'''] *[http://press.asus.com/release.php?id=87 ''ASUS Wins 16 Awards at Computex 2016'' - PR on '''ASUS'''] *[http://www.asus.com/News/PXhfwKFxpFhcFz0t/ ''News: ASUS Devices at Computex 2016'' - PR on '''ASUS'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32848-synology-formally-announces-its-wireless-router ''Synology Formally Announces Its Wireless Router'' on '''SNB'''] *[http://www.techbang.com/posts/43745-2016-computer-d ''ASUS BRT-AC828/M2'' on '''Techbang'''] (Computex 2016) *[http://ifworlddesignguide.com/entry/199723-brt-ac828m2 ''ASUS BRT-AC828/M2'' on '''iF WDG'''] (Computex 2016) ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/new-asus-brt-ac828-wireless-ac2600-dual-wan-vpn-router.32839/ ''New ASUS BRT-AC828/M2 Router'' on '''SNB''' forums] :*CPU: QCA IPQ8065 @1.7GHz dual core ARM (Krait 300) :*Memory: 128MB Flash and 512MB RAM (DDR3) :*Wi-Fi: 2x QCA9984 4T4R, Wave2, MU-MIMO, VHT160 ::160MHz for both 2.4GHz and 5GHz (80MHz+80MHz) :*Ports: 2x WAN (2x QCA8033), 8x LAN (RTL8370MB), 2x USB 3.0 *[http://forums.hardwarezone.com.sg/internet-bandwidth-networking-clinic-4/%5Bmaylyn-networking-preview%5D-asus-brt-ac828m2-router-5380402.html ''ASUS BRT-AC828/M2 Router'' on '''HardwareZone''' forums] :*HW NAT: Fully HW NAT dual WAN for Internet speeds up to 2Gbps ::with 8x backbone GbE LAN ports with 2x set of bonding ports ::Dedicated QCA HW AES/3DES/SHA crypto accelerator engine. :*Support Failover, Teaming on SLA, 802.3ad Aggregation :*Support SATA/AHCI M.2 SSD up to 500GB size available ::The M.2 SSD slot allows 42/60/80mm type of M.2 SSD *[http://www.mobile01.com/topicdetail.php?f=110&t=4817952 ''ASUS BRT-AC828/M2 VPN Router'' on '''Mobile01''' forums] *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1409-asus-brt-ac828m2-z-dwoma-portami-wan-dla-zastosowań-biznesowych/ ''ASUS BRT-AC828/M2 Router'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) ===Rewiews=== *[http://www.thetechrevolutionist.com/2017/07/tried-and-tested-how-asus-brt-ac828.html ''ASUS BRT-AC828/M2 Router'' on '''Tech Revolutionist'''] *[https://tweakers.net/productreview/168871/asus-brt-ac828.html ''ASUS BRT-AC828/M2 Router'' on '''Tweakers'''] *[https://einfoldtech.com/asus-brt-ac828-ac2600-dual-wan-vpn-wi-fi-router-review/ ''ASUS BRT-AC828/M2 Router'' on '''Einfold'''] *[http://www.blacktubi.com/review/asus-brt-ac828-business-router-review/ ''ASUS BRT-AC828/M2 Router'' on '''Blacktubi'''] *[https://www.geeklingo.net/asus-brt-ac828-ac2600-dual-wan-vpn-wi-fi-router-reviewed/ ''ASUS BRT-AC828/M2 Router'' on '''GeekLingo'''] ===GPL Info=== {{SCollapse|GPL info • >> |
############################################################################
# Qualcomm Atheros little-endian ARM platform, linux-3.4.x
# SOC: IPQ8064
# Valild option for BOOT_FLASH_TYPE are shown below:
#	SPI, NAND
# Valild option for WIFI_CHIP are shown below:
#	BEELINER, CASCADE
# Valid option for SWITCH_CHIP are shown below:
#	QCA8337N
#	RTL8370M_PHY_QCA8033_X2		(BRT-AC828 SR1~3, REV 1.00 ~ 1.20)
#	RTL8370MB_PHY_QCA8033_X2	(BRT-AC828 SR4 or above, REV 1.30+)
# Valid option for IPSEC are shown below:
#	OPENSWAN, QUICKSEC, STRONGSWAN or y

export BRT-AC828 := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y QCA=y BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y SAMBA3=3.6.x MEDIASRV=y MODEM=y MODEMPIN=y 
  PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y PRINTER=n USB="USB" GRO=y APP="installed" AUTODICT=y LANWAN_LED=y BUILD_NAME="BRT-AC828" 
  BRTAC828=y SHP=y NVRAM_SIZE=0x20000 ODMPID=y UBI=y DUAL_TRX=y EXT4FS=y OPENVPN=y VPNC=y MDNS=y DUALWAN=y DUMP_OOPS_MSG=y 
  DEBUGFS=y SSH=y REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y FINDASUS=y IPSEC=STRONGSWAN STAINFO=y CAPTIVE_PORTAL=y \
	WEBDAV=n SWEBDAVCLIENT=n DROPBOXCLIENT=n FTPCLIENT=n SAMBACLIENT=n \
	NTFS="tuxera" TFAT=y HFS="tuxera" DISK_MONITOR=y \
	MTWANCFG=y \
	BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=NAND WIFI_CHIP=CASCADE SWITCH_CHIP=RTL8370MB_PHY_QCA8033_X2 WANPORT2=y PWRSAVE=y \
	XHCI=y ATEUSB3_FORCE=y M2_SSD=y \
	BLINK_LED=y WANRED_LED=y PWRRED_LED=y FO_LED=y EJUSB_BTN=y \
	REPEATER=y PROXYSTA=y DISABLE_REPEATER_UI=y USER_LOW_RSSI=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y ATF=y \
	UBIFS=y PSISTLOG=y \
	TEMPROOTFS=y WPSMULTIBAND=y \
	EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS=""

export RT-AC88N := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y QCA=y BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y SAMBA3=3.6.x MEDIASRV=y MODEM=y MODEMPIN=y 
  PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y PRINTER=y USB="USB" GRO=y APP="installed" AUTODICT=y LANWAN_LED=y BUILD_NAME="RT-AC88N" 
  RTAC88N=y SHP=y NVRAM_SIZE=0x20000 NTFS="open" ODMPID=y UBI=y DUAL_TRX=y EXT4FS=y OPENVPN=y VPNC=y MDNS=y DUALWAN=y 
  DUMP_OOPS_MSG=y DEBUGFS=y SSH=y REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y FINDASUS=y STAINFO=y \
	WEBDAV=y SMARTSYNCBASE=y DROPBOXCLIENT=y FTPCLIENT=y SAMBACLIENT=y \
	MTWANCFG=y \
	BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=NAND WIFI_CHIP=CASCADE SWITCH_CHIP=QCA8337N PWRSAVE=y \
	XHCI=y ATEUSB3_FORCE=y \
	BLINK_LED=y \
	REPEATER=y PROXYSTA=y USER_LOW_RSSI=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y ATF=y \
	UBIFS=y PSISTLOG=y \
	TEMPROOTFS=y WPSMULTIBAND=y \
	EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS=""

export RT-AC88S := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y QCA=y BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y SAMBA3=3.6.x MEDIASRV=y MODEM=y MODEMPIN=y 
  PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y PRINTER=y USB="USB" GRO=y APP="network" AUTODICT=y LANWAN_LED=y BUILD_NAME="RT-AC88S" RTAC88S=y 
  SHP=y NVRAM_SIZE=0x10000 NTFS="open" ODMPID=y EXT4FS=y OPENVPN=y VPNC=y MDNS=y DUALWAN=y DUMP_OOPS_MSG=y DEBUGFS=y SSH=y 
  REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y FINDASUS=y STAINFO=y \
	WEBDAV=y SMARTSYNCBASE=y \
	MTWANCFG=y \
	BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=SPI WIFI_CHIP=CASCADE SWITCH_CHIP=RTL8370MB_PHY_QCA8033_X2 PWRSAVE=y \
	XHCI=y ATEUSB3_FORCE=y \
	BLINK_LED=y WANRED_LED=y PWRRED_LED=y FO_LED=y EJUSB_BTN=y \
	REPEATER=y PROXYSTA=y USER_LOW_RSSI=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y ATF=y \
	JFFS2=y PSISTLOG=y \
	TEMPROOTFS=y WPSMULTIBAND=y \
	EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS=""
}} ===See also=== :[[List of Four Stream Hardware]] *[[ASUS BRT-AC828]] - [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065 :LAN: RTL8370M/QCA8033 x2 (SR1~SR3, REV 1.00~1.20) *[[ASUS BRT-AC828/M2]] - [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065 :LAN: RTL8370MB/QCA8033 x2 (SR4 or above, REV 1.30+) *[[ASUS RT-AC88S]] - [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065/RTL8370MB/QCA8033 x2 *[[ASUS RT-AC88N]] - [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065/QCA8337N *[[ASUS RT-AC88Q]] - [[Qualcomm]] IPQ806x *[[ASUS RT-AC85U]] - [[MediaTek]] MT7621A *[[ASUS RT-AC82U]] - [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 *[[ASUS RT-AC65U]] - [[MediaTek]] MT7621A *[[ASUS RT-AC58U]] - [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4018 *[[ASUS RT-AC57U]] - [[MediaTek]] MT7621A *[[ASUS RT-AC42U]] - [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 *[[ASUS 4G-AC53U]] - [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 ==Images== *[https://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/237-asus-brt-ac828/ ''ASUS BRT-AC828/M2 Gallery'' on '''OpenITforum'''] __NOTOC__
